nodes.text: The Gaulus sector was a sector of the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy. It contained the Ryloth system, the location of the planet Ryloth, which was the site of a battle during the Clone Wars.

Following the rise of the Galactic Empire, a faction of the Twi'lek species native to Ryloth rebelled against the Empire in the Ryloth insurgency, which led to the Sith Lords Darth Sidious and Darth Vader visiting the world.
